Join Our Mission

Are you passionate about AI education and want to make a difference in Armenia? We're always looking for talented individuals to join our team.

Get In TouchApply as Instructor

AI4ALL Armenia

Democratizing AI education in Armenia by empowering youth (15-29) and teachers across all regions with essential AI skills. An initiative by the Enterprise Incubator Foundation (EIF) and USAID.

In partnership with:

EIF•USAID•AI4ALL
